info.name: test
info.description:
This collection includes collection-level variables for webhook notifications:
- `webhook_url`: Configure your webhook endpoint (Slack, Teams, etc.)
- `notification_enabled`: Set to "true" to enable notifications

The collection includes a post-response script that tracks test results and provides webhook notification templates.
